A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Personally I thought this was extremely well done.

A lot of people are probably irritated and giving it bad reviews because they went in expecting certain things to exist. When those things didn't happen the way they wanted them to\, they weren't happy.

Here's the thing - it isn't YOUR film.
It is the dreams and vision of the team that made it happen.

I think they did a bang up job and deserve the gleaming review I am giving them.

Character development?
Check
Story progression?
Check
Great cinematic action and cinematography?
Check

Ideas from the original trilogy repeating but also changed?
Check

Going into this movie expecting certain things to be a certain way is setting you up for frustration and disappointment. Just like was the case with episode 7.

I loved this.
And I can see seeds of certain things I hope will happen in episode 9.

Do I expect them to? No. I'm not the one making the movie.

But I can sure as well hope for it.

Me and my rebel scum.
